name: Race a la Mode
description:
This track doesn't seem to be winnable? The engine is out of the car, pinball and level-edit your way to victory! That is, touch all white checkpoint-banners and then the pink finish-line one!

RACE_MODE

get all checkpoints + finish

no engine, use environment

arrow down: bumper

arrow left/right: flippers

space to switch to EDIT mode

stuck? press Z to reset

EDIT_MODE

time continues in edit-mode!

left-click + drag: move object

right-click + side-drag: rotate object

arrows: move camera

car + checkpoints not moveable

space to switch to RACE mode
